text: Bill Jones was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Carroll College in Helena, Montana from 1930 to 1931. Prior to that, he was a player (1926 to 1927) and assistant coach (1929 to 1930) at the University of Notre Dame under legendary head coach Knute Rockne. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Notre Dame Fighting Irish football players Category:Notre Dame Fighting Irish football coaches Category:Carroll Fighting Saints football coaches Category:People from Sioux City, Iowa Category:Players of American football from Iowa
title: Bill Jones (Notre Dame football)
